description: Everyone needs a sidekick (well maybe not Superman, but still).  With the Super Hero Sidekick Alexa will be your sidekick, always there with a quote or phrase to help you through your toughest super villain battle (or just making breakfast).
exampleInteractions: Alexa tell my sidekick to give me a phrase.
Alexa tell my sidekick that its at times like this that I need a little encouragement.
Alexa ask my sidekick to help me.
name: Super Hero Sidekick
shortDescription: Need some encouragement?  Ask your super hero sidekick for inspiration.
